## TestPackage - Tutorial
The main functions are ``hello()`` and ``test()``. Their usage is as follows

```{r test}
library(TestPackage)

hello()
test()
```

### Some theory
``test`` uses the following expression

\begin{align}
y = 1 + 1.
\end{align}
